entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Murdochville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:39 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then snow at times heavy. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing. High minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 17. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 19. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 11. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
